name: Postal 2: Share the Pain
description:
Postal 2: Share the Pain is an action-shooter game developed by Running With Scissors. It came out on 16-12-2003. It was published by Running With Scissors. Postal 2: Share the Pain has a Metascore of 59, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Postal 2: Share the Pain on PC.
Michael J. Riedel and Vince Desi produced the game. It was directed by Michael J. Riedel.
